rules_text:
At the beginning of your upkeep, intone. [i](To intone, either put a +1/+1 counter on a creature you control or create a Blood token.)[/i]
Whenever you discard a card, up to one target creature an opponent controls gets -3/-0 until end of turn. If this is the second time this ability has resolved this turn, Muse of Disruption gains flying until end of turn.
